summary: Unit test module that exercises the DynUNet architecture, checking that the model can be instantiated, runs in evaluation mode, produces tensors with correct dimensions for 2‑D and 3‑D inputs, supports deep‑supervision outputs, and remains numerically consistent when configured with 3‑D instance normalization and NVFuser fusion.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the dynamic UNet implementation used in medical image segmentation pipelines, ensuring it works across platforms, respects expected tensor shapes, and maintains performance optimizations for production deployments.
